name: Jets Wave Goodbye
description:
Hello and thank you for checking out JETS WAVE GOODBYE

You can find the dev team (and more of their work) on twitter:

writing: @aquaries419
music: @DionteGeorge
coding: @toadheart
art/project management: @ruuneverse

JETS WAVE GOODBYE was created for the Record Collection Jam, but we obviously went over time, and spent a good 3 months on it. It was made using rpgmaker mv! You can play it in browser, or download MAC and WINDOWS builds to play on your own computer.

The game takes a minute to load when you first start it up! When the RPGMAKER logo pops up, you are good to go. If it does not, try closing it out and loading it back up again!

Very proud of this game, and very grateful to the folks on the team!
-r
